title: Large windows for abundant natural light, Resident lounge
posting_body: A stylish home with an innovative soul
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1115 Sq.
At Avana Sunnyvale, we have tapped into the most essential elements of the California lifestyle and thoughtfully embedded them into every detail of our community.
Inside, you’ll find an array of desirable amenities like our hydrotherapy spa, 24-hour fitness center and Wi-Fi in all common areas.
So if you’re looking to unplug and unwind, we’ve got just the thing for you.

Avana Sunnyvale also serves as your quintessential network to the Golden Triangle, one of the most vibrant technology corridors in the state, which also features a wide variety of notable shopping, dining and recreational destinations.
Fast access to public transit, like the Caltrain and VTA Light rail, as well as US Highway 101 and the Central Expressway makes staying connected easier than ever.
Enhance your living experience today at Avana Sunnyvale.
- Bay windows ideal for a home office set-up or reading nook*
- Convenience of full-sized washer and dryer in each residence
- Expansive one, two and three-bedroom floorplans
- Beautiful fireplaces for a unique personal touch*
- Large windows for abundant natural light
- Vaulted ceilings to create an open, airy layout*
- Private balcony or terrace for relaxing after a long day*
- Separate dining area great for entertaining friends & family
- Expansive walk-in closets with built-in shelving
- Fire sprinkler system throughout each home
- Fast access to US Highway 101 and the Central Expressway
- Near public transit, like the Caltrain and VTA Light rail
- Subterranean garage, covered, and open parking available
- Resort-style swimming pool and hydrotherapy spa
- A mile from the Golden Triangle
- BBQ area with picnic tables ideal for entertaining
- Wi-Fi in common areas makes staying connected easy
Pet rent & pet deposit required.*Breed restrictions apply*
